content.question: A <math alttext="2 kilogram " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>2</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mtext>kg</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math> object travels across a horizontal surface with a constant speed of <math alttext="6 meters per second " overflow="scroll"><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mn>6</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mfrac><mrow><mtext>m</mtext></mrow><mrow><mi>s</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>. An applied force that increases with time is then exerted on the object. A graph of the force exerted on the object as a function of time is shown. The applied force is in the direction of the object’s displacement. All frictional forces are considered to be negligible. What is the object’s speed after the force has been applied for <math alttext="4 seconds" overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>4</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mtext>s</mtext></mrow></mstyle></math>?

choices.label: <math alttext="16 meters per second " overflow="scroll"><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mn>16</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mfrac><mrow><mtext>m</mtext></mrow><mrow><mi>s</mi></mrow></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="22 meters per second " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>22</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mfrac><mrow><mtext>m</mtext></mrow><mrow><mi>s</mi></mrow></mfrac></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="32 meters per second " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>32</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mfrac><mrow><mtext>m</mtext></mrow><mrow><mi>s</mi></mrow></mfrac></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

<math alttext="44 meters per second " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>44</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mfrac><mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mtext>m</mtext></mrow></mstyle></mrow><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mrow><mi>s</mi></mrow></mstyle></mfrac></mrow></mstyle></math>

content.answer: <math alttext="22 meters per second " overflow="scroll"><mstyle><mrow><mn>22</mn><mspace depth="0.0ex" height="0.0ex" width="0.3em"></mspace><mstyle mathvariant="normal"><mfrac><mrow><mtext>m</mtext></mrow><mrow><mi>s</mi></mrow></mfrac></mstyle></mrow></mstyle></math>

skill.text: 2.B: Calculate or estimate an unknown quantity with units from known quantities, by selecting and following a logical computational pathway.
